div.p:
Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xv die
aprilis anno quo supra

The saide day It was Statutit ordanit and deliuerit be ane suorne
assis' that ale nichtbouris Induellaris of this burghe and ale alienaris
that bringis In ony gret Salt within this havin sale deliuer to Sanct
Nicholes werk ane Smale mett of Ilkan hundretht conforming to
the alde lovabill Rite constitud' and vys of the said' burghe'

Eodem die Karolus loremar conuictus per assisam ex ore Johannis Stevinson'
prelocutoris eiusdem per perturbio Willelmi tulche cuj emendabit ut Jura volunt
et Idem Willelmus quitus de perturbio ipsi Karoli et si idem Karolus in postum
aliquem perturbauerit Inde conuictus fuit repulsus erit de burgo et hoc per dictam
assisam deliberatum fuit

The saide day criste prat come Souerte be his hande vphaldin that
thome Ridall sale entir this day xv dais befor the balyeis to
ansuer to the borghe' fundin one him for the wranguis' Intromet
timg with ane barrel of tar' pertening to Alexander annand'

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xviijo
die mensis aprilis anno quo supra

The saide day sere Jonhne ruthirfurd knicht lauchfullie callit
and nocht comperit to ansuer' to the borghe' fundin one him be Johne
leslie of warderis and Annabele of gordon' for the wranguis' haldin
fra him to his saide Spous' of iiijor li' xix s' vij d' tharfor the
aldirman and balyeis ordanit Johne Cuk and Williame scrimgeour officiaris to pas'
to sere Johne ruthirfurde and tak ane Stress and lat it Agan to borghe and It
be askit and Warne him to Comper this day xv dais the secund'
day of maij to Cum to Ansuer' to the saide borghe' as secund'
day of proces'

The saide day sere Jonhne ruthirfurd' knicht lauchfullie callit and nocht
Comperit to Ansuer to the borghe fundin apone him be Dauy
Kintor for the wranguislie haldin fra him of viij merkis tharfor
the aldirman and balyeis ordanit William scrimgeour and gilbert prestone
officiaris to pas' ande tak ane stres' of the said' knichtis and lat It
agan to the borghe' and It be askit ande warne him to comper
this day xv dais to ansuer to the said' borghe' as secunde
day of proces'

Curia balliuotum burgi de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xvjo die aprilis
anno quo supra

The saide day Dauy menyes Johne of cullan Alexaner Rede gilbert menyes
Alexander mar' Androw murray William blinsele Robert crag thomas Waus
patry leslie William Wormet mathow branche and Johne Steuinson'
burgis of the saide burghe Suorne the gret bodely aithe at commavnde
and charge of the aldirman and balyeis In defalt of movable' gudis
quhilkis coud nocht be comprehendit be the Officiaris apprisit ane annuell
Rent of xlv schillingis yerlie to be tane and Rasit of the tua landis
of thomas fyfis liand within the said' burghe in the Castalgat one
the northt part of the samyn gat betuix the lande of maistir Johne badenaghe'
one the Est and the lande of vmquhile thomas prat one the West part
To the pament of the Some of xlv li' vsuale money of Scot
lande aucht to the abbat and convent of arbrothoc and optenit befor the
lordis of our' Souerane lordis Counsall for' ane annuell Rent of
fyve pundis of Nyne yeris annuell bigan vnpait aving of the saide landis
efitr the tenor of our' Soueran lordis lettres vndir the Signet directit
to the aldirman and balyeis tharupon'

Eodem die thomas Redale fecit constituit creauit et nominauit thomam leslie
et thomam Waus coniunctim et diuisim suos legittimes procuratores ad respondendum plegio super Ipsum
per alexandrum annande porrectum penes vnam barellam bituminis Agendum defendendum
et cetera promittens de Rato et Rato

Tile ale and Sindrie to quhais knalege thir lettres sale cum Alexander menyeis aldirman
Thomas leslie James Colisone Johne mar' and Dauid mar' balyeis of this burghe of
abirdene greting in gode euirlesting with ale humilite honour and Reuerence as efferis for same
kile as our Soueran lordis lettres vndir the Signet was directit to vs sereffis in
that part coniunctlie and seueralie to pas conpell and distrenye the landis and mak penny of Rediast gudis
of thomas fyffis burgis of the saide burghe Ande falyeing of his movabile gudis
to pas' his landis for the Some of fourty fiwe pundis pundis vsuale money of scot
lande for ane annuel Rent of fiwe li' of nyne yeris bigane Recouerit be ane decret befor the lordis of our Souerane lordis consall And caus' ane venerabill fadir in gode Dauid abbat of arbrothot and
the conuent of the Samyn be content and pait tharof eftir the tenor of our Souerane
lordis lettres directit to vs tharupon' as in the samyn mair' fullie Is contenit Ande thareftir we the saide
aldirman and balyeis passit serssit and socht the movabile gudis of the saide thomas
be our' Selff and our' Officiaris and coud' nocht comprehend nayn' movabile gudis pertening
to the saide thomas within the boundis of our office In defalt of the quhilkis
at the charge of our said' Soueran lordis lettres forsaide lauchfullie gert warne
and charge thir personis eftir follouing that is to say Dauid menyes Jonhe' cullan
Alexander Rede gilbert menyes William blinsele alexander mar' Androw murray Robert
crag thomas leslie Waus patry leslie William Wormet mathow
branche and Johne Steuinsone burges of the saide burghe to Comper
befor ws in the court of the saide burghe haldin within the tolbutht
of the Samyn the Sextene day of the monetht of aprile the yer' of god'
jM fiwe hundretht and tua yeris to pris' the landis of the said thomas
for the saide Some of fourty fiwe li' and atour we causit to warne the
saide thome fyf to comper the saide day and place befor ws to her'
and se his landis prisit for the said Some Quhilkis personis fensit and
affirmit the gret bodelie aithez suorne Inclusit within the consalhous'
of the said' burghe Riplie avisit apprisit ane annuele Rent of fyve xlv s'
pundis vsuale money of Scotlande yerlie to be Rasit of the tua landis
of the saide thomas liand' within the said' burghe togiddir in the Castalgat
one the northt part of the samyn gat betuix the land of mastir Johne
badenaghe' one the Est part one that ane part Ande the lande of vmquhile
thomas prat one the West part one that vthir part' to the avale of
the said Some of xlv li' Ande passit thareftir to the mercat Corse of
the saide burghe and thar be oppin proclamacion' askit the saide annuell Rent to
the saide thomas or ony vthiris that walde cum and by It within xv dais next
thareftir with Intracion and nay man walde Cum within the saide xv dais
to by the saide annuell Rent we walde assigne It to the creditouris Ande
the saide xv dais being bigan the saide thomas nor' nayn vthiris / walde pay
the saide Some for the saide annuell Rent tharfor be verteu of our office
we assignit the saide annuell Rent to the saide Abbat and convent and to
dene James lauson' monk and procurator of the saide place with tham and thir
Successouris to Reman eftir the forme of act of parliament' the Est lande nerrast the
lande of mastir Johne badenaghe' Is hiddir of the saide hous' of Arbrothot
in Regalite and the West lande In haldin of the King be burrow seruice

Curia Balliuorum burgj de aberdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem vicesimo
die mensis aprilis anno quo supra

The sayd day Alexandro hay oblist him be the faitht of his bodie to kep Johne
Wilyongsone skathles of tua hart hiddis at the handis of alexander Walcar
executour tile vmquhile Dauid Walcar his brodir

The saide day gilbert prestone grantit him avande to marion'
Walcar' xxxvj s' and viij d' for ane land Scho gevande to
him ale charteris and evidentis According tharto of Ressoun'

Eodem die plegium porrectum super Willelmum serray litstar per
Willelmum cheyshame continuatur vsque ad pennultimum aprilis
propter debilitatem Curie sine preiudicio parcium

add.foreign: Richerde le feur' gallicus et nostri mercatores

div.p:
The saide day Richerde le feur' franchman and merchande of Rovane
was Accusit for the selling of his merchandice tile vthiris merchantis
with ane wrangis pvnde quhilkis the saide Richerde denyit and in continent
the saide actioun' was put to the decisioun' of thir personis eftir writin
that is to say Johne of Cullan Alexander mar' patry leslie Alexander gray Johne
Steuinson' Dauy Kintor' henry rede cristy prat Duncan crak William
Ketht William Duncan Jonhne le frans' and Jonhne Suedry quhilkis
riplie auisit the gret Aithez Suorne deliuerit be the moutht of
the saide Johne of Cullane In the name of the saide assis' ale in
ane voce concordand that the saide Richerde le feur' hed' wrangit in
the selling of his merchandice with ane wrang pvnde and aw till
Amend' as law and forber' in tyme to Cum et cetera

Curia balliuorum de aberdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem vicesimo sexto
die mensis aprilis Anno Domini millesimo quingentesimo secundo

The saide day Johnne mar baillie lauchfully callit warnit and nocht
comperit to ansuer to the borght strekit one him be Johnne of myddilton'
for the wrangwis' withhaldin fra him of s' quharfor the ballies
ordanit androw nachtj officiar to pas' and tak ane stres' of the said ballie
and warne to cum and ansuer to the said borght one friday nixt tocum

xxvij die Aprilis anno Domini Milleimo quingentesimo secundo Johannes blak fecit constituit creauit
et nominauit Richardj ruthirfurde et dominum Johannem blak coniunctim et diuisim suos
legittimos procuratores dans et concedens eisdem ac eorum alteri suam liberam potestatem
ad respondendum plegio super ipsum porrectum per Jonetam litstar pro iniusta occupacione
cuiusdem piscatorie ut asseritur per Agendum defendendum et prosequendum promittens
de Rato et grato

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem penultimo
die aprilis anno quo supra

The saide day Sandy gray be his avne toung grantit was
in Ane amerciament of the court for the skathing of ane pak of walde
pertening to Johne Steuinsone and to Amende as law will et cetera

Johannes Knollis gilbertus menyes Andreas murray thomas Waus patricius Rede
patricius leslie Willelmusame larde Dauy fynne Johnne Waus Andreas meldrum Dauid
Kintor Andreas cristeson' Johne murray et Robertus Rede Jurati dicunt quod quondam Alexandrum
et Johannes Steuinson' Wilson Auunculus Andree Wobstar latoris presencium obiit vltra vestitus et sasitus ut
de feodo ad pacem et fidem domini nostri Regis de quadam terra Interiore cum pertinenciis
Jacente in vico de Skulhill ex boreali parte eiusdem vici inter terram Alexander crag
ex orientali ex vna et terram Johannis moir' ex ocidentali partibus ab altera et terram
quondam Ade Andirsone versus austrum et latum dicti burgi versus boriam

The said' day Johne mar' balye lauchfullie callit and nocht comperit to ansuer
to the borghe' fundin one him be Johne of mydiltone for the wrang
uis' haldin fra him of ix s' tharfor the balyeis ordanit Androw nachtj officiar'
to pas' and tak ane stres' fra the saide Johne and lat it Agan to borghe' and It
be askit

The said day the balyes assignit monunday the xxiij day of maij Instant to
to ansuer to the borgh fundin one him be Johne Steuinson for the speking of ane of Walld'

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem secundo die maij
anno Supra

The saide day the court wardit schew for law and It was gevin for dome
that the borghe fundin be Johne mar' procuratour for the larde of Warderis and his
Spous' that Duncan fyf procurator for sere Johne ruthirfurd' aw to mak litiscon
testacion' in the Actioun' follouit be the saide Johne leslie et cetera and defendit be
the saide Duncan was of waill and the Recovnter fundin be the saide Dun
can
was fundyne of nayne avale for the quhilk the said Duncan as procuratour
for the said' knicht was in ane Amerciament of the court

The saide day the aldirman and ballieis assignit to Duncan fyff procuratour to sere Johne
ruthirfurde to ansuer to the borgh' fundin one him be Dauy Kintor monun
day eftir the trinite day nixt to Cum for the wranguis' haldin fra him
of viij merkis et cetera as the Secunde day of process'

The saide day Williame blinsele come Caucioner' that sere Johne ruthirfurd'
sale halde ferme and Stabill it that Duncan of fyf dois In his nayme
anent the borghe' fundin one Dauy Kintor be the said knicht for the wrang
wis' haldin fra him of v eln of franche clatht

The saide day Dauy Kintor denyit the borghe' fundin one him for the
wranguis' haldin fra him sere Johne ruthirfurd' of fyve eln' of franche clathtis Ande Duncan
fyf procurator for the said' knicht tuk to preiwe that he aw the saide
clatht one friday the vj day of maij Instant befor the aldirman
and balyeis

Eodem die Dauid Kintor fecit constituit creauit et nominauit Johannem mar'
suum legittimum procuratorem Actorem et factorem et cetera dans et concedens eidem suam potesta
tem omnimodam ac mandatum speciale ad respondendum plegio super ipsum per
procuratorem Johannis ruthirfurde militis porrecti de et super iniusta detencione ab eo quinque
vlnarum pannj gallici ac quod testem opponendum Ac prosequendum plegium
super dictum militem per Ipsum porrectum de et super iniusta detencione ab
eo octo marcarum prout in actis curie plenius continuetur Agendum prosequendum
respondendum et cetera omnia faciendum promitens de Rato et grato
cum ceteris clausulis necessarius et oportunis et cetera

The saide day Jonhne mar procurator for Johne leslie of Warderis
and annabele gordone his spous' requerit the balye to ger' cale sere
Johne ruthirfurde knicht or his procuratouris to ansuer to the borghe fundin
one him the xiij day of marche the yer' of gode jM VC and ane yer'
for the wranguis' haldin fra tham of iiijor li' xix s' and vij d' resauit be
fra him for the girssome of ane demi nethis fischingis of the Raik
and nocht allouit to tham and thar' comperit Duncan fif procurator for the saide knicht
and allegit that he awche nocht to ansuer' to the saide borghe' quhile John'
Cuk officiar' repetit the samyn becaus' it was strekit in his handis
Ande the said Johne mar' procurator for the saide Johne leslie and his spous' allegit that
he hed' gottin the Copy of the saide borghe' lang obefor in writ and that
was referit to the aithe of the said Johne Cuk officiar' be the saide
Duncan quhilk deponit be his aithe that he hede gevin the Copy of the
said' befor to the said' sere Jonhne ruthirfurde obefor Ande als' that the
saide Duncan awche to ansuer' to the said' borghe becaus' It was in
the akis of the court buk and opinlie Rede to him diuers' tymes quhilk
he mycht haue gottin for the askinge Ande becaus' he walde nocht ansuer
the said' Jonhne mar' procurator as saide Is fande ane borghe in the hande
of William scrimgeour ane of the officiaris of the saide burghe that the said' knicht be him
Self or his saide procuratour aw to ansuer to the said' borghe' Ande the
saide Duncan procurator as saide Is Recovnterit the said' borghe' allegeand
he awche nocht to ansuer to the said' borghe' quhile the saide Jonhne
Cuk officiar repetit It quhilkis borghe' and Recovnter the partiis being
Removit the Court riplie auisit wardit be thir persones gilbert menyes
Jonhne Wormet thomas Waus William blinsele William andirson Johne
Kintor Johne Steuinson' William Ketht Dauy blinsele Johne mydilton'
Johne annand' patry Rede gavane murray gilbert litstar' Duncan crak
Dauy fynne Androw strathin Johne auchneyve William nicholsone
Johne Duncansone William larde thome talyour Johne balcrome
and Alexander malison' burgis of the said' burghe and gaf for dome be the moutht
of Alexander Johnesone dempstar' of the said court that Johne ruthirfurd' be him self
or his procurator awche to ansuer' to the said' borghe et cetera Ande tharfor fande the borghe
fundin be the said' Johne mar' procurator as said is that the said' knicht or his procuratouris awche
to ansuer' to the saide borghe of vaill and the Recovnter of nayn availl Ande
maide in the contrar' be the said Duncan procurator for the said' knicht The quhilk
dome pronuncit and gevin be the moutht of the saide dempstar the saide Duncane
procurator as saide Is agan callit and falsit this dome forsaid sayande Alexander Jofrasone dempstar
of this court that dome that thow has gevin aganis me Is fals evile and Rottyn' in It
Self And tharto ane borghe' Johne Cuk seriand' of this court in thi hande becaus' yow
the saide Johne cuk officiar repetit nocht the said' borghe Ande protestit for mair' Resonis
to be gevin in tyme and place conuenient tharto tueching the falsing of the saide dome
And' th sere Johne ruthirfurd' oblist him be his hande landis and gudis to folow
and persew the falsing and Agancalling of the said' dome in the bestwis' and fre According'
tile our Souerane lordis lawis Ande in continent the saide Johne mar' procurator as saide Is
askit the Rolment of this court to be gevin to him or the saide Johne leslie and his spous'
vndir the balye Seill be Ande protestit that the Resounis and lavis salde be gevin'
off the said' knichtis to the hede lord chavmerlan of Scotlande or his deputis within terme of
law and protestit for his resounis and defence to be gevin in the saide matir conuenient tharto
Requirit the notar to subscriue the saide process'

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem Sexto die maij
anno quo supra

the saide day cristy prat oblist him In the name of thome Redale to pay tile
Alexander annande his part of the barrell of tar' safar' as pertenis to him quhilk
was tane be him and his complicis and thome leslie oblist him to freithe the
saide cristy tharanent

Eodem die Alexander morisone et sponsa sua amerciatur per assisam Juratam ex ore
Willelmi blinsele prelocutorum eiusdem pro perturbio Johannis colly cuj emendabunt
ut Jura volunt

Testibus Johanne ruthirfurd deuenit plegius ad prosequendum falsacione dicti Judicij Ade steuinson
Willelmo Andirson Junior et Willelmo scrimgeour et dicto Johanne Streueling notario publico

The saide day Jonhne mar' fande ane borghe' as procurator
to Dauy Kintor in the handis of William scrimgeour sergeand / that the
Duncan fyf procurator to sere Johne ruthirfurd' hede falyeit in his
preyve of fyve eln' franche clatht quhilk he tuk to preyve
this Instant day Ande fand' ane vthir borghe that his said'
borghe was of waill in the handis of the said' officiar' in
defalt of Recovntering'

The saide day the aldirman and balyeis continevit the decision' of
this said' borghe' and the warde of the court for waknes of the court
In defalt of warderis to friday the xij day of maij Instant

The said' day It was Sufficientlie preuit be diuers' personis
lauchfullie warnit comperit and Suorne In presence of the
balyeis that Wat Saifray hed' Intromettit with the best
govne that was vmquhile Alexander Wilsounis quhilk
was ane blak govne And' the said' Walter falyeit in his
preiwe that he tuk to preiwe thar was ane bettir caldron' of
the saide Alexandris than he entromettit with et cetera

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta In pretorio
eiusdem xiij die maij

The saide day the balyeis grantit tua Amerciamentis of the courtis
to Jonhne of mydiltone to be estimat be the considiracioun'
of thame for ix s' clamyt be him for wyne

The saide day Duncan fyf procurator to sere Johne ruthirfurd'
gravntit that the said knycht was aving to gilbert menyes
xxxv s' and vj d' for certane Rede clatht and Sevyne sillir
quhilkis the balyeis ordanit him to pay within terme of law

The saide day the court wardit Schew for law and It was
gevin for dome that Duncan fyf procurator to sere Jonhne ruthirfurde had'
falyeit in his preywe Anent the fyve elne of franche clathis
that he tuk to preyve that Dauy Kintor' was avande
to him for the quhilk the saide Duncan as procurator forsaid' was
in ane Amerciament of the court and the saide Dauy quyt of the
said' knichtis challance of the saide fyve eln' of franche
Clathtis et cetera

The saide day Duncan fyf procurator to sere Jonhne ruthirfurd' present the
Resounis allegit be him Agan the falsing of the dome falsit
be him Anent the borghe' fundin be Johne mar' procurator for Johne
leslie of warderis and Annabill gordon' his Spous' Inclusit in papir
vndir the Sele of the said' knichtis and hed' thame avay with him
agan

Eodem die Johannes Wormet deuenit plegius legalis per manus
sue dextere oneracionem Jacobo Colisone et Dauid macer balliuis quod
Johannes mar' erit Indempnis pro Johanne ruthirfurd' milite aliter
quam per viam Juris Et Johannes leslie de Warderis deuenit plegius
legalis quod dictus Johannes ruthirfurd miles erit Indempnis
pro dicto Johanne mar' aliter quam per viam Juris et quilibet dictarum parcium
obligatur per manus sue dextere oneracionem ad obseruandum suos plegios
Indempnes de huiusmodi fideiussione Testibus alexandro menyes
preposito Johanne leslie de Warderis Johanne Cullan Alexandro Rede Johanne
Waus Andrea Steuynson' dicti balliui testantur quod Idem miles ob
ligatur ad releuandum suum plegium de huiusmodi fideiussione
